name: lol-items
description: Simplified, up-to-date, League of Legends items list.
author: Nicolas Gryman <ngryman@gmail.com> (http://ngryman.sh)

scripts.test: npm run lint -s && npm run spec -s
scripts.build: babel-node -e "require('./').default({ flat: true }).then((items) => require('fs').writeFileSync('items.json', JSON.stringify(items, 0, 2)))" --presets es2015
